title: Java正版勋章怎么申请
author: Insanjury
txt_content: 如题，我买了Java版而且已经在玩了，那应该怎样申请那个勋章呢？

replies.author: Insanjury
replies.txt_content: 还有顺便问一下我的头像换了，怎么看到还是史蒂夫

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-35291-1-1.html勋章申请
换了头像后按Ctrl+F5清除缓存

replies.author: 2002bluesky
replies.txt_content:
Java版正版勋章申请帖
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-35291-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)
Xbox 360/One、PlayStation 3/4/Vita、Switch/WiiU/3DS版正版勋章申请帖
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-529378-1-1.html

replies.author: Insanjury
replies.txt_content:
小孩孩 发表于 2020-2-23 09:38
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-35291-1-1.html勋章申请
换了头像后按Ctrl+F5清除缓存
好了，终于能看到头像了
